title: NoFap
summary: NoFap is a website and community forum that serves as a support group for those who wish to give up pornography and masturbation.[1][2][3] Its name comes from the slang term 'fap', referring to male masturbation.[4] While reasons for this avoidance vary by individual, the main motivation cited is attempting to overcome addiction to pornography [lower-alpha 1][5][6] or other compulsive sexual behaviours.[7][8] Other reasons include religious and moral reasons, self-improvement, and physical beliefs that are not supported by medicine.[9][10]
